label: deferredPayableTotalChargeAmount
comment: A monetary value of the total charges, including tariff and non-tariff charges, deferred for this cross-border regulatory procedure.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of formal steps to satisfy a cross-border regulation, law or convention.
